name: Dream Way
description:
You just woke up in a weird place. Everything seems secure, nothing can harm you... But then you discover the reason: a strange creature, self-called Dream Lord, captured you and wants to keep you with him forever. Even death isn't an escape from him... Or is it?

This simple game is the first product of our team that, at least for the moment, is called Neo-Team (there was indeed an "old team" before). You'll face some puzzles to challenge Dream Lord and to show him that you can actually make choices. 

==================== CREDITS ====================

----

- Daniel Libonati "danlibs" Gomes: Game Design/Level Design/Programming

- Julio "Abraham_An" Albarran: Character Design/Animations/Tileset

- Rok "Tirinius" Kravanja: Programming

- William "Fonysony" Santos: Programming/SFX Design

----

Other assets there were used in this project:

- RPGTalk by Seize Studios

- Evil Bunny font by Sheenie Richards

- Harmonies of Time by Gonzalo Varela

- Loop & Music Free by marching dream

- Action RPG Music Free by VGcomposer
